definition: whip or lash/to flog/to whip/conductor's baton/segmented iron weapon (old)/penis (of animal, served as food)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: He ruthlessly lammed out at his servant.
sentences.chinese: 他無情地鞭打他的僕人。

sentences.english: I close my eyes, grinding his teeth, waiting for the first beat down.
sentences.chinese: 我閉着眼，咬着牙，等着第一鞭打下來。

sentences.english: He switched his horse to make it go faster .
sentences.chinese: 他鞭打馬，讓他走的快點。

sentences.english: Since then , befouled water, mildewed fodder and the relentless whip have been a way of life for the horse.
sentences.chinese: 它的生活中只有渾濁的水，黴爛的草料和瘋狂的鞭打。

sentences.english: Five times from the Jews I received forty stripes minus one.
sentences.chinese: 被猶太人鞭打五次，每次四十，減去一下。

sentences.english: Captain Bilgh scourged his crew without mercy.
sentences.chinese: 布萊船長殘忍地鞭打他的船員。

sentences.english: Let him put handcuffs on the dead and beat them senseless with whips.
sentences.chinese: 讓他銬上死人的手吧，鞭打他們無知覺的屍體吧。

sentences.english: This was worse than a thousand whippings.
sentences.chinese: 這一席話比一千下鞭打更管用。

sentences.english: He became angry and began to thrash a servant.
sentences.chinese: 他很生氣，就開始鞭打一個僕人。
革命，進化，咀嚼，鞭打，規則。

sentences.english: Then, strongly blew wind, whipped the road full of the dusty.
sentences.chinese: 接着，勁風驟起，鞭打道路，塵土飛揚。

sentences.english: Usman cruelly whipped her and vowed to let she were dead.
sentences.chinese: 烏斯曼殘忍地鞭打她，發誓要讓她生不如死。

sentences.english: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus, and scourged him.
sentences.chinese: 當下彼拉多將耶穌鞭打了。

sentences.english: Thanks to those who have lashed me because they cleared my way.
sentences.chinese: 感謝鞭打過我的人，因爲他消除了我的業障。

sentences.english: The tum and overarm whip of one's left side is the key factor of the distance in shot putting.
sentences.chinese: 身體左側的轉動與鞭打是提高投擲遠度的關鍵因素。

definition: to flog/to lash/to whip/to urge or goad along
to beat a prisoner (to obtain confessions)/to give sb the third degree/to torture
beating with wooden staves (as corporal punishment)
